name: The Adventures of Mallow
description:
A game made in 48 hours for NSCC Game Jam 2019

A playable demo for our game jam game, play as a cute marshmallow in a candy world! Make sure to play the game in 1920 x 1080 for the best experience :)

  • Background music - SashaGrey
  • Background and assets - Ruffflebutt
  • Character animation - SaltyRockets
  • Game coding - Sean Fischback and Ryan Lewis
